name: Something Awful Dark Theme
description: Something Awful Dark Theme (by teen phone cutie on SA say hi or somethin)
css:
@-moz-document domain("forums.somethingawful.com") {
  html,
  body,
  div#container,
  .post tbody .bbc-block:not(.userquoted),
  td.title div.lastseen,
  #forum td.title div.lastseen a.x,
  table.standard td,
  .dictionary_show .letternav li a,
  .gloryhole div#main_small table.stats td,
  ul.contactlist {
    background: #3b444b !important;
  }

  #content ul#usercpnav {
    background: transparent !important;
    box-shadow: none;
    border: none;
  }

  .seen1 .userinfo,
  .seen1 .postdate,
  .seen2 .postbody,
  .seen2 .postlinks,
  tr.subforum td {
    background: #656565 !important;
  }

  .seen1 .postbody,
  .seen1 .postlinks,
  .getinfo .standard td,
  .seen2 .userinfo,
  .seen2 .postdate {
    background: #585858 !important;
  }

  .altcolor1 .userinfo,
  .altcolor1 .postdate,
  .altcolor2 .postbody,
  .altcolor2 .postlinks,
  #forum tr.seen td.icon,
  #forum tr.seen td.author,
  #forum tr.seen td.views,
  #cpmain #forum td.lastpost,
  #forum tr.seen td.button_remove,
  #forum tr.seen td.star,
  #forum td.star,
  #forums td.icon,
  #forums td.moderators,
  #info tr td:nth-child(odd),
  .altcolor1 td.userinfo,
  .altcolor1 td.postdate,
  #forum td.icon,
  #forum td.icon2,
  #forum td.star,
  .privfolder #content table tr td.status,
  .privfolder #content table tr td.icon,
  div.standard,
  .privmsg #thread table.post td.userinfo,
  .privmsg #thread table.post td.postdate,
  .threadlist td.author,
  .threadlist td.views,
  .threadlist td.lastpost {
    background: #1d1d1d !important;
  }

  .altcolor1 .postlinks,
  .altcolor1 .postbody,
  .altcolor2 .userinfo,
  .altcolor2 .postdate,
  div.breadcrumbs a.up span,
  div.pages a,
  .showthread .breadcrumbs span.mainbodytextlarge a.index,
  #forum tr.seen td.title,
  #forum td.replies,
  #forum tr.seen td.rating,
  .forumhome #forums td.title,
  .forumhome #forum td.title,
  #pm tr td,
  #info tr td:nth-child(even),
  .privfolder #content table tr td.title,
  .privfolder #content table tr td.date,
  .privfolder #content table tr td.sender,
  .privfolder #content table tr td.check,
  #main_full,
  .privmsg #thread table.post td.postbody,
  .privmsg #thread table.post td.postlinks,
  .privmsg .messages_nextprev a,
  .threadlist td.title,
  .threadlist td.rating {
    background: #2d2d2d !important;
  }

  .seen1 dd,
  .seen1 dt,
  .altcolor1 dd,
  .altcolor1 dt,
  .seen2 dd,
  .seen2 dt,
  .altcolor2 dd,
  .altcolor2 dt,
  .postbody,
  .postdate,
  .showthread .breadcrumbs span.mainbodytextlarge,
  #forum tr.seen td.views,
  #cpmain #forum td.lastpost div,
  .breadcrumbs b,
  #pm tr td,
  #info tr td,
  .privfolder #content table tr td.date,
  #main_full,
  .searchresults .blurb,
  #posts li .byline,
  div.standard,
  .gloryhole div#main_small table.stats td,
  .privmsg #thread table.post dt,
  .privmsg #thread table.post dd,
  .privmsg #thread table.post td.postbody,
  form b,
  #thread table.post p.editedby span,
  tr.subforum td,
  .threadlist .date,
  .forumlist_container div,
  .mainbodytextsmall,
  #copyright a,
  #nav_purchase a,
  .threadlist td.views,
  .search_container #search_info {
    color: #d6d5d5 !important;
  }

  .bbc-block blockquote,
  #copyright,
  .getinfo .standard td dl dt,
  .getinfo .standard td dl dd,
  .search_help div,
  .getinfo .standard td p,
  #content a,
  .navigation li a,
  .blurb em,
  .getinfo .standard td h3 {
    color: #e4d6c5 !important;
    text-shadow: none !important;
  }

  .navigation li a,
  #nav_purchase a,
  #usercpnav a {
    font-weight: normal !important;
  }

  #content a:hover,
  .navigation li a:hover {
    color: #4686ad !important;
  }

  .userquoted {
    background: darkslateblue !important;
  }

  td.postlinks ul.profilelinks li a,
  #forum td.title div.lastseen a,
  #usercpnav li,
  .altcolor1 td.postdate a,
  .altcolor1 td.postlinks ul.profilelinks li a,
  .altcolor2 td.postdate a,
  .altcolor2 td.postlinks ul.profilelinks li a,
  #thread dl.userinfo dt.author,
  .dictnav a,
  .gloryhole div#main_small h3,
  .forumdisplay #forum.threadlist td.title.title_sticky div.info a.thread_title,
  #forum .thread td.title a.announcement {
    text-shadow: none !important;
  }

  .postbody code:not(.no-highlight) {
    background-color: #ffffed !important;
  }
  /* start annoucements styles */
  .announcement .postbody,
  .forumlist_container,
  .forumlist_container .hover,
  .search_container #search_info,
  #nav_purchase,
  .navigation {
    background: #363636 !important;
    color: wheat !important;
  }

  .announcement .userinfo,
  .announcement .top,
  .announcement .thread,
  #something_awful.announcement td.postdate,
  .announcement .postlinks,
  #something_awful.announcement #thread table.post,
  .announcement .userinfo dt,
  .announcement .userinfo dd {
    background-color: #1d1d1d !important;
    color: wheat !important;
  }
}

discussions.name: Very nice skin, only problem was I had to play around with SALR colours to make some stuff visible,
Dark theme for embedded tweets? (Sorry for the multipost---Stylish forums' bug)
Dark theme for tweets? (Sorry for the multipost---Stylish forums' bug)
